bibl.title: Epistula Philippi II regis Macedonum : A Forged Document?
bibl.note: Two hitherto unpublished papyri from the Oxyrhynchus collection dating from the Roman period serve as an example to set their irregularities quoted in the letter against any genuine elements preserved in them: P. Oxy. Inv. C 229 22-7 (De Corona, § 156-157); - P. Oxy. Inv. 34 4B.77/D(2-3)a + 34 4B.77/D(4-6)c,d (De Corona, § 110-194). A full edition is included in the author's D.Phil. Thesis (Univ. Oxford, 2006): Some Literary Papyri from Oxyrhynchus. The papyri are forthcoming in a future volume of P. Oxy.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Salemenou Maroula, Epistula Philippi II regis Macedonum (Demosthenes, De corona XVIII 157): A Forged Document?

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 661-669.

Two hitherto unpublished papyri from the Oxyrhynchus collection dating from the Roman period serve as an example to set their irregularities quoted in the letter against any genuine elements preserved in them: P. Oxy. Inv. C 229 22-7 (De Corona, § 156-157); - P. Oxy. Inv. 34 4B.77/D(2-3)a + 34 4B.77/D(4-6)c,d (De Corona, § 110-194). A full edition is included in the author's D.Phil. Thesis (Univ. Oxford, 2006): Some Literary Papyri from Oxyrhynchus. The papyri are forthcoming in a future volume of P. Oxy.
